abilities.description: (PASSIVE)DEATH IN LAVENDERBel'Veth gains permanent attack speed stacks after taking down large minions and monsters and champions. She also gains temporary bonus attack speed after using an ability.
abilities.name: DEATH IN LAVENDERB

abilities.description: (Q)VOID SURGEBel'Veth dashes in a chosen direction and damages all enemies she passes through.
abilities.name: VOID SURGEB

abilities.description: (W)ABOVE AND BELOWBel'Veth slams her tail to the ground, damaging, knocking up, and slowing her enemies.
abilities.name: ABOVE AND BELOWB

abilities.description: (E)ROYAL MAELSTROMBel'Veth roots herself in place, channeling a storm of slashes around her that targets the lowest-health enemy and grants her lifesteal and damage reduction.
abilities.name: ROYAL MAELSTROMB

abilities.description: (R)ENDLESS BANQUETBel'Veth consumes Void coral remnants, transforming into her true form and increasing her max health, attack range, attack speed, and out-of-combat move speed. Consuming the Void coral remnants of a Void epic monster will grant her a longer ultimate duration, as well as the power to summon Void remora.
abilities.name: ENDLESS BANQUETB
